summary: Patch for Requiem and Revenge Of the Enemies
descriptionHtml:
[size=2]I like the abilities that are distributed to the enemies of ROTE.
But the existing patch for requiem did not suit me.
So I decided to make my own.﻿[/size][size=4]


[/size][center][size=4]﻿[b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Feature of thi[/font][/b][/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4][b]s patch[/b][/size][/font][/center]
[list]
[*][size=3]You will not find opponents with Auto Levels (All enemies, including those that ROTE adds, will have a static level).[/size]
[*][size=3]Maximum combined abilities and perks of ROTE with abilities and perks of Requiem.[/size]
[*][size=3]The stats of the enemiesfrom ROTE are adjusted to the stats of the enemies from Requiem. (You will not find a Dwemer mechanism with the amount of HP as a bandit).[/size]
[*][size=3]Integrated changes from popular mods – Minor Arcana and Breaking Bad ([/size][size=2]For example: Minor Arcana changes forsworn and ROTE changes forsworn. Previously, you would have to choose whose changes you would like to see in the game. But with this patch you must not do it![/size][size=3])[/size]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][size=3][u][color=#fce5cd]Nota Bene[/color][/u][i]: Although the mods themselves are not required, you still need to use them to see all the changes introduced by these add-ons. [/i][i]In the patch only conflicting records are combined.[/i][/size]

[center]
[b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][size=4]About versions[/size][/font]
[size=4]([/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#6aa84f][size=2][u]Choose only one version[/u][/size][/color][/font][size=4])[/size][/b][/center][b]
[/b]
[color=#6d9eeb][size=4]Light[/size][/color][size=3] – Just a patch for ROTE, nothing superfluous.
[/size]
[size=4][color=#c27ba0]Classic[/color] [/size][size=3]– The patch for ROTE with integrated a patch for SIC. (Now some enemies from SIC can use the abilities of ROTE!)
[/size][font=Lucida Sans Unicode][color=#c27ba0]
 [/color][/font]
 
[size=4][center][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Required[/font][/b][/center][/size]
[size=3]Dragonborn
Dawnguard
Skyrim immersive Creatures ([i][u]only[/u][/i] for [color=#c27ba0]Classic version[/color])
Revenge Of the Enemies
Requiem 
Fozar Dragonborn Patch[/size]

[size=4][center][b][font=Lucida Sans Unicode]Loadorder[/font][/b][/center][/size]
 
[size=3]Skyrim.esm

…
Skyrim Immersive Creatures.esp ([u][color=#cc4125]NOT[/color][/u] required for [color=#6fa8dc]Light Version[/color] )
Rebirth Monster.esp
…
Requiem.esp ([b][color=#f6b26b]Only for 1.9.X[/color][/b])
Fozars_Dragonborn_-_Requiem_Patch.esp
…
Requiem - Immersive Creatures.esp ([u][color=#cc4125]NOT[/color][/u] required for [color=#6fa8dc]Light Version [/color])
…
Requiem_Minor_Arcana.esp ( [color=#f1c232]at will[/color] )
Requiem - Breaking Bad.esp ( [color=#f1c232]at will[/color] )
…
Requiem - RoteExperimental Patch.esp
[/size]


/----------------------------------------------------
[size=3]P.S. Since the patch turned out to be quite voluminous, there is a small probability that I have missed something
somewhere. Therefore I will be grateful to the detailed bug reports and constructive criticism.[/size]
author: Dimitry

files.name: Requiem Experimental Patch
files.changelogHtml:
- Skeletons are reworked
- The daedra skeleton is strengthened.
- Fixed a vampire skeleton that could cause the crash of the game.
- Fixed the appearance of the vampire skeleton.
- Fixed problems with aggressiveness in some skeletons.
- Added keywords for better compatibility with USLEEP.
- Edited the fighting style of the red eagle.
- Added the red eagle stats from the BB.
- Added keywords for Requiem SkyProc.
- Classic: Some skeletons have the ability to resurrect from SiC.
- Classic: Edited lvl-sheets with mobs for better compatibility with SiC.
